channel.title: Project DZ-74, new private server looking for a coding team - no experience need
channel.description:
[center]Project DZ-74[/center]
DZ-74 is a new server, that is looking for coders. A hoster and someone that could make a webclient is also needed. We dont have any requirements that you is a java expert. We want java expert too, but we want peopls that knows next to nothing about java, so we can learn together and make an awesome runescape private server! Sounds like something for you? Then keep reading.
____________________________________________________________________________________________
[center]Source[/center]
We shall use a very plain source, so we can build up so much as possible from scratch.
____________________________________________________________________________________________
[center]How it shall look like when done[/center]
It shall be a PKing server, and without 1-hit-for-185 xp rate. Players shall be proud when they finally get the max skill :) The best items will require max skill in ex attack or defense. It shall be a server that will be fun for everyone to play. And now when Jagex have ruined Runescape, I hope that many players will start playing Private servers, and that they will see us as kind of a replacement for "real Runescape". I know that there is many other servers that is awesome in all ways. But we want to have a server better then them. But for that we need all help we can get! So I hope that you join, so we can become all that!
____________________________________________________________________________________________
center]How to join[/center]
Go to our forum [url=http://dzseventyfour.forumn.net]here[/url] and register. Then post an application, and hope you get accepted. We would like everyone to come and join.
____________________________________________________________________________________________________
Hope that you will join. Thanks for reading the post. If anything here is wrong or doesnt make sence, please tell me :)

item.title: Project DZ-74, new private server looking for a coding team - no experience need
item.dc:creator: @java-programmer java-programmer
item.description:
@java-programmer wrote:

[quote=“BurnInSilence, post:3, topic:170784”]UHH i might be interested…but i cant use my java processes…run/compile right now ffs
i dont like the idea of using a plain source because we can use almost any source and get rid of alot, which only a few hour fix
i rather hear more about YOUR application here, motivate me to work with you[/quote]

whats wrong with your run/compiler??

Read full topic
